% About
# <i class="fas fa-glasses"></i>About {-}
In this website are available the data and scripts used in the manuscript [*MGIDI: a powerful tool to analyze plant multivariate data*](https://plantmethods.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13007-022-00952-5)


# <i class="fas fa-code"></i>How to reproduce? {-}

* [Download data](https://github.com/TiagoOlivoto/paper_mgidi_pm/archive/refs/heads/master.zip)
* Open the `*.Rmd` file in RStudio.
* Optionally change functions and arguments.
* Knit the document to see the results.
